com.groupdocs.search.dictionaries

Class DictionaryBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groupdocs.search.dictionaries.DictionaryBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AliasDictionary, Alphabet, CharacterReplacementDictionary, HomophoneDictionary, PasswordDictionary, SpellingCorrector, StopWordDictionary, SynonymDictionary

    public abstract class DictionaryBase
extends Object

    Represents the base class for a dictionary.
